about_the_game:
OVERVIEW


Embrace your inner jeepney driver once again in the big, bustling streets of Manella City! Pick up passengers, calculate change, and weave through traffic in this one-of-a-kind driving game.

TUTORIAL

This demo contains the tutorial for Jeepney Simulator 2, which teaches players the basics of the game's controls and goals while giving them a fun and immersive experience that shows the potential of the main game.

FEATURING THE BIG, BUSTLING MANELLA CITY


Immerse yourself in a city based on the real thing! With familiar landmarks as Tondoo, Rizz El Park, and BBC, you'll feel right at home. And with the addition of a few unique landmarks, we guarantee there's lots of adventure to be had!

REALISTIC DRIVING AND IMMERSIVE GAMEPLAY


- REALISTIC GRAPHICS
- Rotating steering wheel and moving gear shift, with INVERSE KINEMATICS
- HEAR THE JEEPNEY ROAR with immersive audio
- Simple, yet REALISTIC DRIVING! Watch your RPM meter and change gears at the right time!

REALISTIC TRAFFIC SYSTEM


Navigate the busy streets and weave through traffic!

content_descriptors.notes: The player can run over pedestrians. There is no gore and the pedestrians stay alive and will be rescued off-screen. Children cannot be run over.

short_description: Embrace your inner jeepney driver once again in the big, bustling streets of Manella City! Pick up passengers, calculate change, and weave through traffic in this one-of-a-kind driving game. This demo contains the tutorial for Jeepney Simulator 2.
